repairedDockerfile:
FROM melpon/wandbox:clang

MAINTAINER melpon <shigemasa7watanabe+docker@gmail.com>

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
      apt-file \
      build-essential \
      git \
      vim \
      wget && \
    apt-file update && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
